sentences.sContent: She’s got two daughters and one son.
sentences.sCn: 她有两个女儿和一个儿子。

sentences.sContent: ...Leah reflects on a time she listened to the whispers: “About the time my daughter was five years old...
...But nobody greeted the daughter and mother when they arrived...
...Maria and her daughter drive an ice-cream truck through neighborhoods and parks in Billings...
...One mother said that before her daughter was involved in this project...
...Her daughter built a hospital with her money...
...I teach their daughter Pen at school...

phrases.pCn: 父与女（动画短片，曾获奥斯卡最佳动画短片奖）
